basic.description:
Students will gain fundamental knowledge of regression analyses as used in rehabilitation/health research, and practical skills to conduct such analyses.  Topics include correlation, basic linear regression, multivariate linear regression, and logistic regression.  SPSS, statistical software will be used throughout the course.   (1.0 credit units). 
PREREQUISITE: undergraduate statistics.  EXCLUSION: RHBS 834*
basic.subject: RHBS
basic.title: Regression Analysis
